Scenario.description: Having taken the town of Troina, the Allies must now push through the hills and take the village of Cesaro to finally break the central portion of the Etna Line
The Americans are pushing to Messina along the northern coast while the the 29th Panzergrenadier Division delays them at every town and ridge.
An Italian infantry battalion rushes toward Gela. A Ranger company and the USS Savannah stand in their way. Best as US vs AI.
15 Jul 1943: A battlegroup of the 1st Canadian Infantry Brigade faces its first battle against the Germans at Grammichele. H2H or either side vs the AI.
Italian and American foot patrols skirmish beyond the Belice River. MEETING ENGAGEMENT
16 Dec, 1944 (semi historical) small size HTH or Singleplayer. Light Snow
MAP SIZE 640x880 OBJECTIVE Road Junctions and Farm ATTACKER SETUP South - AI defending
MAP SIZE 640x1100 OBJECTIVE search 3 large farms AMERICAN paratroopers ATTACK ITALIAN infantry.
Elements of the US 157th Regiment/45 Infantry Division assault the Tobacco Factory, north of the Salerno bridgehead. Playable in any mode.
45th Infantry Division assaults Bloody Ridge
German recon forces run into unprepared American forces. July 1943. Axis vs AI only.
Fictional Panzergrenadier attack with a platoon of Brummbärs for fire support. Best played as Axis vs AI, or HvH.
Hermann Goring Panzer Division counterattacks the beach head
40+Turns ALLIED VS AI ONLY
Rangers storm two naval gun batteries and drive inland against Italian Blackshirt troops. HTH, Axis Human vrs 3 x American AI plans. 2kmx2km map.

A half company of infantry runs into a German blocking position. April 1944. Allied vs AI only.
18 Jul 1943 - the 'Hasty P's' ambush German Panzergrenadiers during fighting in the hilly interior of Sicily then struggle to hold a vital crossroad. H2H or vs. AI.
Patton meets fierce resistance in Corleone as he heads West to Palermo. ALLIED ATTACK
The Germans attempt to collapse the Anzio Beachhead. Playable in all modes.
MAP SIZE 1120 x 800 OBJECTIVE Village (damaged) German armour and infantry attack brittish defenders.

The Hasty P's defend against the 15th Panzergrenadier Division at Valguarnera. Playable in all modes, stronger player should play Axis in HvH.
8th Army moves on Rimini Airfield.
Allied scouts observe Axis troops hastily leave a small village in Sicily. HQ wants A company to take and hold it before dawn. H2H Allies v AI
In the race to Palermo, combat engineers on route reconnaissance find themselves too far forward. July 1943. Axis vs AI only
The stand at Noertrange, Luxembourg, 18 Dec, 1944 (Semi-Historical) HtH or Single player. If single Player best played as Germans. For use with the BULGE 44 mod.
D Company of the 504th PIR clashes with the 5th Company Rgt 15 Panzer Grenadiers for control of the Venafro-Isernia route. Playable in all modes.

Battaglione Fucilieri under heavy US attack in an attempt to hold two bridges.

14 Platoon consolidate their area after an attack. Best played as Allies or HvH.
A British task force is sent to destroy a high value target at all costs. Best played as Allies vs AI.
13 Jul 1944 - British troops enter Priolo. H2H or vs AI as either side.
Loyal Guastatori defend their CO from arrest by the Germans (fictional), playable as Human Defender vs AI Attacker. No H2H playtesting/balancing has been done.
